select B.ENTR_DT/*가입일자*/ ,B.GUAR_NO/*학부모번호*/ ,B.GUAR_NM/*학부모명*/ ,C.SPOS_NM/*학부모명(배우자)*/ ,A.STDT_NO/*학생번호*/ ,A.STDT_NM/*학생명*/ ,D.PLC_CLSS_CD /*현재위치분류*/ ,D.LOC_NM/*현재위치(주소)*/ ,E.DGEM_STAT_CD/*위험감정상태*/ ,F.STRS_IDX/*스트레스상태*/ ,G.GROW_IDX/*성장상태*/ ,G.FAT_IDX/*비만상태*/ ,I.BAND_ID/*밴드ID*/ ,I.TEL_NO/*전화번호*/ ,I.BLTH_ID/*블루투스 ID*/ ,A.SEX_CD/*성별*/ ,A.BITH_DT/*생년월일*/ ,J.LOC_NO/*소속학교번호*/ ,J.LOC_NM/*소속학교명*/ ,A.BITH_DT/*나이*/ ,A.BAND_STAT_CD/*현재상태*/ ,F.MENT_STRS_STAT_CD/*현재상태*/ ,F.PHYS_STRS_STAT_CD/*현재상태*/ ,1 as "기간내 캐시비 사용금액"/*기간내 캐시비 사용금액*/ ,K.USE_CBEE_AMT/*총 캐시비 사용금액*/ ,K.CBEE_BAL/*캐시비 잔액*/ from TM_STDT_BASE A left outer join TM_GUAR_BASE B on A.GUAR_NO_1 = B.GUAR_NO left outer join TM_SPOS_BASE C on B.SPOS_NO = C.SPOS_NO left outer join TM_GUAR_APNT_PLC DD on B.GUAR_NO = DD.GUAR_NO left outer join TS_LOC_INFO_BASE D on DD.LOC_NO = D.LOC_NO left outer join TS_STDT_STRS_HIST F on A.STDT_NO = F.STDT_NO left outer join TS_STDT_DGEM_HIST H on F.STDT_NO = H.STDT_NO left outer join TI_DGEM_STND E on H.ACT_DIV_CD = E.ACT_DIV_CD left outer join TS_GFIX_HIST G on A.STDT_NO = G.STDT_NO left outer join TS_BAND_INFO I on A.BAND_ID = I.BAND_ID left outer join TI_EORG_BASE J on A.EORG_LOC_NO = J.LOC_NO left outer join TS_STDT_CBEE_HIST K on A.STDT_NO = K.STDT_NO where 1=1
and B.ENTR_DT between #{entrFr} and #{entrTo}
and A.STDT_NO = #{stdtNo}::numeric
and A.STDT_NM like concat('%',#{stdtNm},'%')
and I.TEL_NO like concat('%',#{telNo},'%')
and I.BAND_ID like concat('%',#{bandId},'%')
and B.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::numeric
and C.SPOS_NM like concat('%',#{sposNm},'%')
and B.GUAR_TEL_NO like concat('%',#{guarTelNo},'%')
and J.LOC_NM like concat('%',#{locNm},'%')
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}

,#{smryCntn} /* smry_cntn 요약_내용 character varying(100) */
,#{specCntn} /* spec_cntn 상세_내용 character varying(4000) */
,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )

,gidx_fr = #{gidxFr} /* gidx_fr 성장지수_FROM numeric */
